articles.author: Greg Norman
articles.title: Russian court orders Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich held 3 more months: state media - Fox News
articles.description: An investigator from Russia’s Federal Security Service (FSB) asked a Moscow court to keep detained American journalist Evan Gershkovich behind bars until August 30.
articles.content:
A Russian court on Tuesday extended the detention of imprisoned American journalist Evan Gershkovich for another three months. 
The state-run TASS news agency said an investigator from Russias Feder… [+3578 chars]
